name: GAAddStienEmailsToIdentifiers
rule:
INSERT IGNORE INTO identifiers
SELECT et.* FROM (
	SELECT :type AS `type`,`E-mail 1 - Value` AS `value`,:contactId AS `contact_id` FROM StienGoogleContactMatches WHERE `Custom Field 2 - Value` = :RegistrationNbr AND LENGTH(TRIM(`E-mail 1 - Value`)) > 1
	UNION
	SELECT :type AS `type`,`E-mail 2 - Value` AS `value`,:contactId AS `contact_id` FROM StienGoogleContactMatches WHERE `Custom Field 2 - Value` = :RegistrationNbr AND LENGTH(TRIM(`E-mail 2 - Value`)) > 1
	UNION
	SELECT :type AS `type`,`E-mail 3 - Value` AS `value`,:contactId AS `contact_id` FROM StienGoogleContactMatches WHERE `Custom Field 2 - Value` = :RegistrationNbr AND LENGTH(TRIM(`E-mail 3 - Value`)) > 1
	UNION
	SELECT :type AS `type`,`E-mail 4 - Value` AS `value`,:contactId AS `contact_id` FROM StienGoogleContactMatches WHERE `Custom Field 2 - Value` = :RegistrationNbr AND LENGTH(TRIM(`E-mail 4 - Value`)) > 1
) AS et
